page.title: 11CURDWORTH HOME AND LIFESTYLE
page.content: CURDWORTH TENDS TO BE YOUNG TO MIDDLEAGED, CHILD-ORIENTATED, WITH HOUSEHOLD BUDGETING CONCENTRATED ON HOME MAINTENANCE. MOST HOMES ARE PRIVATELY OWNED AND ARE WELL, IF NOT LAVISHLY APPOINTED. MOST POSSESS FREEZERS BUT NOT MICROWAVES AND AVOID JUNK FOOD, CHOOSING TO PREPARE MEALS FROM FRESH OR FROZEN PRODUCE. PETS ARE POPULAR. CLEARLY RESIDENTS ARE RESPONSIBLE IN TERMS OF SAFETY APPLIANCES ALTHOUGH LESS INCLINED TO SPEND ON SECURITY. THE LIFESTYLE OF CURDWORTH PRESENTS A PICTURE OF A CARING INVOLVED, FASHIONABLE COMMUNITY OF MODEST AFFLUENCE AND SOBER PURSUITS. TELEVISION AND HIFI ARE POPULAR, VIDEOS LESS SO. LEISURE CLUBS, OFTEN TO DO WITH SPORT AND EATING OUT ARE POPULAR, BUT NOT GAMBLING, BETTING OR BINGO. MOST RESIDENTS CHOOSE TO HOLIDAY IN BRITAIN
